original:
Carrying the weapon 'Mjollnir' on its back, this beast
man Mega level Digimon rules over the lands of frost
and the Ikkakumon and Zudomon corps. With fur as
tough as 'Chrome Digizoid', despite its ruthlessness in
battle, it actually has extreme compassion for its
subordinates.
translation:
Carrying the weapon 'Mjollnir' on its back, this beast
man Mega level Digimon rules over the lands of frost
and the Ikkakumon and Zudomon corps. With fur as
tough as 'Chrome Digizoid', despite its ruthlessness in
battle, it actually has extreme compassion for its
subordinates.

original:
A virus attribute black-colored WarGreymon, what it
believes in and the way it thinks is the exact
opposite to Wargreymon, instead following its own
ideals. It is a very prideful warrior that detests
cowardice, and doesn't associate itself with fellow
Virus types nor dishonest Digimon.
translation:
A virus attribute black-colored WarGreymon, what it
believes in and the way it thinks is the exact
opposite to Wargreymon, instead following its own
ideals. It is a very prideful warrior that detests
cowardice, and doesn't associate itself with fellow
Virus types nor dishonest Digimon.

original:
The Mega stage of Kuwagamon species, this Digimon
was given the nickname 'Demon of the Deep Forest'
due to its nocturnal nature and habitat of the
depths of the Digital World's forests. A fearsome
power dwells within, and it considers itself the
eternal rival of HerculesKabuterimon.
translation:
The Mega stage of Kuwagamon species, this Digimon
was given the nickname 'Demon of the Deep Forest'
due to its nocturnal nature and habitat of the
depths of the Digital World's forests. A fearsome
power dwells within, and it considers itself the
eternal rival of HerculesKabuterimon.

original:
Said to have evolved from Mummy-like Digimon, this
Digimon once boasted absolute rule over the ancient
Digital World. Legend has it mysterious ancient ruins
were built by many Digimon under the rule of
Pharaohmon, demonstrating this Digimon's impressive
authority.
translation:
Said to have evolved from Mummy-like Digimon, this
Digimon once boasted absolute rule over the ancient
Digital World. Legend has it mysterious ancient ruins
were built by many Digimon under the rule of
Pharaohmon, demonstrating this Digimon's impressive
authority.

original:
While this Digimon is member of the 13 Royal Knights,
it is regarded as a being that has the role to
suppress them. Because this has yet to happen,
this Digimon is referred to as the owner of the
'Empty Seat'.
translation:
While this Digimon is member of the 13 Royal Knights,
it is regarded as a being that has the role to
suppress them. Because this has yet to happen,
this Digimon is referred to as the owner of the
'Empty Seat'.

original:
Possessing light energy that can erase evil, this holy
beast Digimon is the Mega form of god beast type
Digimon. While it is rarely seen, and its habitat is
unknown, it appears whenever evil is born into the
Digital World.
translation:
Possessing light energy that can erase evil, this holy
beast Digimon is the Mega form of god beast type
Digimon. While it is rarely seen, and its habitat is
unknown, it appears whenever evil is born into the
Digital World.

original:
Said to be able to freely manipulate time and space,
this composite Digimon was born by combining the
overwhelming power of Machinedramon and the varied
data of Chimeramon. It is unknown what caused the
fusion of data, as this Digimon is completely
shrouded in mystery.
translation:
Said to be able to freely manipulate time and space,
this composite Digimon was born by combining the
overwhelming power of Machinedramon and the varied
data of Chimeramon. It is unknown what caused the
fusion of data, as this Digimon is completely
shrouded in mystery.

original:
This evil dragon Digimon was born from a
malfunctioned Digivolution from WarGrowlmon, and the
existence of it is the very epitome of a 'Digital
Hazard'. It spreads hatred and destroys everything
in its path.
translation:
This evil dragon Digimon was born from a
malfunctioned Digivolution from WarGrowlmon, and the
existence of it is the very epitome of a 'Digital
Hazard'. It spreads hatred and destroys everything
in its path.

original:
This six-legged Digimon is a member of the 13 Royal 
Knights. It wields the sacred crossbow 
'Muspellsheimr' in its left hand and the shield 
'Niflheimr' in its right. It can move at the speed of 
sound and has strong defense due to its 
'Red Chrome Digizoid' armor.
translation:
This six-legged Digimon is a member of the 13 Royal 
Knights. It wields the sacred crossbow 
'Muspellsheimr' in its left hand and the shield 
'Niflheimr' in its right. It can move at the speed of 
sound and has strong defense due to its 
'Red Chrome Digizoid' armor.

original:
Fighting with accumulated red-hot solar energy,
this light dragon Digimon gathers light energy into its
shining wings of light. It's able to summon the
'GeoGrey Sword', which possesses the power of
condensed earth.
translation:
Fighting with accumulated red-hot solar energy,
this light dragon Digimon gathers light energy into its
shining wings of light. It's able to summon the
'GeoGrey Sword', which possesses the power of
condensed earth.

original:
With its body clad in 'Chrome Digizoid' armor, this
beast knight Digimon is capable of moving at
incomparable speeds. Using a wide variety of
skills, this Digimon is able to deceive the
opponent by moving fast enough to create
mirage-like speed echoes.
translation:
With its body clad in 'Chrome Digizoid' armor, this
beast knight Digimon is capable of moving at
incomparable speeds. Using a wide variety of
skills, this Digimon is able to deceive the
opponent by moving fast enough to create
mirage-like speed echoes.

original:
This gigantic cyborg Digimon sacrificed its tough
Metal Body shell in order to add powerful beam
cannons. It is able to dispatch weapons from its body
that offer incredible attack power and it is the
embodiment of the phrase 'The best offense is a
good defense.'
translation:
This gigantic cyborg Digimon sacrificed its tough
Metal Body shell in order to add powerful beam
cannons. It is able to dispatch weapons from its body
that offer incredible attack power and it is the
embodiment of the phrase 'The best offense is a
good defense.'

original:
With the appearance of a ninja, this Digimon is adept
in stealth and is referred to as the 'Silver Crow'
within the Digital Worlds Genesis. It is said that it was
touched by god's anger, causing one of its wings to
be dyed black.
translation:
With the appearance of a ninja, this Digimon is adept
in stealth and is referred to as the 'Silver Crow'
within the Digital Worlds Genesis. It is said that it was
touched by god's anger, causing one of its wings to
be dyed black.

original:
Born together with Chrono Data through the YMIR
Project, this legendary Digimon is capable of
changing into Holy Mode when it Digivolves using the
power of holy light.
translation:
Born together with Chrono Data through the YMIR
Project, this legendary Digimon is capable of
changing into Holy Mode when it Digivolves using the
power of holy light.

original:
Clad in jet black darkness, this demon lord Digimon
takes on the appearance of a young woman. Given
the nickname 'Goddess of Darkness', it lures enemies
in with its mysterious beauty and leads them to their
demise.
translation:
Clad in jet black darkness, this demon lord Digimon
takes on the appearance of a young woman. Given
the nickname 'Goddess of Darkness', it lures enemies
in with its mysterious beauty and leads them to their
demise.

original:
With an aura of scorching flames, and an intimidating
majesty to its appearance, this Digimon is the Mega
level of Flaremon. It's special skill, 'Solblaster',
involves concentrating its power into the solar orb
on its back, and then firing a scorching sun-like ball
at the enemy.
translation:
With an aura of scorching flames, and an intimidating
majesty to its appearance, this Digimon is the Mega
level of Flaremon. It's special skill, 'Solblaster',
involves concentrating its power into the solar orb
on its back, and then firing a scorching sun-like ball
at the enemy.

original:
This Digimon has a moon-like presence and can steal 
the hearts of those who see it. It is the Mega level of 
Crescemon and uses its weapon to perform the special
skill 'Crescent Harken', which involves using the power 
of the moon to confuse opponents with illusions.
translation:
This Digimon has a moon-like presence and can steal 
the hearts of those who see it. It is the Mega level of 
Crescemon and uses its weapon to perform the special
skill 'Crescent Harken', which involves using the power 
of the moon to confuse opponents with illusions.

original:
This fairy Digimon takes on the appearance of the
beautiful lotus, a flower said to bloom in the
heavens. With a lady-like personality, it possesses
the ability to give people good dreams. Despite its
calmness and grace, it will not hesitate to pass down
severe punishment to those who refuse its good will.
translation:
This fairy Digimon takes on the appearance of the
beautiful lotus, a flower said to bloom in the
heavens. With a lady-like personality, it possesses
the ability to give people good dreams. Despite its
calmness and grace, it will not hesitate to pass down
severe punishment to those who refuse its good will.

original:
This special ShineGreymon emerged from a keychain
game. Despite its small statue, the power that dwells
within it is equal to other Mega level Digimon.
However, its full potential is unknown.
translation:
This special ShineGreymon emerged from a keychain
game. Despite its small statue, the power that dwells
within it is equal to other Mega level Digimon.
However, its full potential is unknown.

original:
This special MirageGaogamon emerged from a
keychain game. Despite its small statue, the power
that dwells within it is equal to other Mega level
Digimon. However, its full potential is unknown.
translation:
This special MirageGaogamon emerged from a
keychain game. Despite its small statue, the power
that dwells within it is equal to other Mega level
Digimon. However, its full potential is unknown.

original:
Having amplified its close-combat abilities, this
gigantic Mega level Digimon has evolved from the
Ultimate level Argomon. It is able to fire destructive
beams that are able to distort dimensions from the
eyes all over its body.
translation:
Having amplified its close-combat abilities, this
gigantic Mega level Digimon has evolved from the
Ultimate level Argomon. It is able to fire destructive
beams that are able to distort dimensions from the
eyes all over its body.

original:
Taking on the appearance of an Amazoness, a brave
female warrior from Greek Legend, this Digimon has
been given the nickname 'Snake Princess' due to it
being clad in snakeskin armor. It possesses a great
sword called 'Olympia', which is of equal size to itself,
and swings it around with ease.
translation:
Taking on the appearance of an Amazoness, a brave
female warrior from Greek Legend, this Digimon has
been given the nickname 'Snake Princess' due to it
being clad in snakeskin armor. It possesses a great
sword called 'Olympia', which is of equal size to itself,
and swings it around with ease.

original:
A member of the 13 Royal Knights, it is a unique
warrior that not only excels in strategic command,
but also in direct combat, wielding its sword with
excellent skill. It is able to transform into a beast
during battle, this is known as 'Leopard Mode'.
translation:
A member of the 13 Royal Knights, it is a unique
warrior that not only excels in strategic command,
but also in direct combat, wielding its sword with
excellent skill. It is able to transform into a beast
during battle, this is known as 'Leopard Mode'.

original:
Inhabiting the depths of the jungle, this dinosaur
Digimon's back is covered in extremely sharp blades.
With impressive defensive capability, this Digimon can
cause massive damage by charging into the enemy.
translation:
Inhabiting the depths of the jungle, this dinosaur
Digimon's back is covered in extremely sharp blades.
With impressive defensive capability, this Digimon can
cause massive damage by charging into the enemy.

original:
One of the fastest beings in the Digital World, this
Digimon is a member of the Olympos XII. It is so
incredibly fast that it cannot be seen by the naked
eye, and it is said that all images recorded in records
are nothing but afterimages.
translation:
One of the fastest beings in the Digital World, this
Digimon is a member of the Olympos XII. It is so
incredibly fast that it cannot be seen by the naked
eye, and it is said that all images recorded in records
are nothing but afterimages.

original:
Having been discovered in an abandoned oriental
computer, this dragon man Digimon is a subspecies of
Greymon. While the extent of its strength is still
unknown, its special 'Kikurin' swords slice at the
enemy using eerie tracks of light left in its wake.
translation:
Having been discovered in an abandoned oriental
computer, this dragon man Digimon is a subspecies of
Greymon. While the extent of its strength is still
unknown, its special 'Kikurin' swords slice at the
enemy using eerie tracks of light left in its wake.

original:
Said to possess an undying body, this legendary
beast Digimon is considered the King of vampire
Digimon. Using the 'Charm' effect in its voice, it
subdues the opponent and causes them to 'Fall
Down'.
translation:
Said to possess an undying body, this legendary
beast Digimon is considered the King of vampire
Digimon. Using the 'Charm' effect in its voice, it
subdues the opponent and causes them to 'Fall
Down'.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Wind', this Digimon is one
of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the ancient
Digital World. Possessing golden wings and a beautiful
golden figure, this Mega level Digimon has existed
since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Wind', this Digimon is one
of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the ancient
Digital World. Possessing golden wings and a beautiful
golden figure, this Mega level Digimon has existed
since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Light', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Referred to as the 'Supreme
Shining Beast', this Mega level Digimon has existed
since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Light', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Referred to as the 'Supreme
Shining Beast', this Mega level Digimon has existed
since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Ice', this Digimon is one
of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the ancient
Digital World. Said to possess the strength and
bravery to adapt to even the most intense freezing
tundra, this Mega level Digimon has existed since
ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Ice', this Digimon is one
of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the ancient
Digital World. Said to possess the strength and
bravery to adapt to even the most intense freezing
tundra, this Mega level Digimon has existed since
ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Flame', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Referred to as a 'Mega' being,
with power that surpasses present time Megas, this
Mega level Digimon has existed since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Flame', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Referred to as a 'Mega' being,
with power that surpasses present time Megas, this
Mega level Digimon has existed since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Water', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Ruling over the Net Ocean and
capable of controlling the currents and waves, this
Mega level Digimon has existed since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Water', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Ruling over the Net Ocean and
capable of controlling the currents and waves, this
Mega level Digimon has existed since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Steel', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Having existed since ancient
times, it's said that there is nothing that this Mega
level Digimon doesn't know.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Steel', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Having existed since ancient
times, it's said that there is nothing that this Mega
level Digimon doesn't know.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Darkness', this Digimon
is one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Born from darkness and ruling
over all destruction and extinction, this Mega level
Digimon has existed since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Darkness', this Digimon
is one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Born from darkness and ruling
over all destruction and extinction, this Mega level
Digimon has existed since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Wood', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. With various mechanisms within
its body, it prides itself on being the biggest of the
Ancient Digimon. It is a Mega level Digimon that has
existed since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Wood', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. With various mechanisms within
its body, it prides itself on being the biggest of the
Ancient Digimon. It is a Mega level Digimon that has
existed since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Thunder', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. With the appearance of many
insects such as the Rhinoceros Beetle and Stag
Beetle fused together, this Mega level Digimon has
existed since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Thunder', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. With the appearance of many
insects such as the Rhinoceros Beetle and Stag
Beetle fused together, this Mega level Digimon has
existed since ancient times.

original:
Possessing the attribute of 'Earth', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Possessing the most power
amongst the Ancient Digimon, this Mega level Digimon
has existed since ancient times.
translation:
Possessing the attribute of 'Earth', this Digimon is
one of the Ten Warrior Digimon that saved the
ancient Digital World. Possessing the most power
amongst the Ancient Digimon, this Mega level Digimon
has existed since ancient times.

original:
This holy knight Digimon was based on a legend that
appears within a certain 'Prophecy' handed down
from the ancient Digital World. It is able to extend
weapons and a shield from the 'V Bracelets' equipped
to its arms.
translation:
This holy knight Digimon was based on a legend that
appears within a certain 'Prophecy' handed down
from the ancient Digital World. It is able to extend
weapons and a shield from the 'V Bracelets' equipped
to its arms.

original:
Considered to have the best manners amongst the
Royal Knights, when this Digimon fights, it will only do
so in a fair one-on-one match. The stronger the
opponent, the more delighted it feels.
translation:
Considered to have the best manners amongst the
Royal Knights, when this Digimon fights, it will only do
so in a fair one-on-one match. The stronger the
opponent, the more delighted it feels.

original:
With the appearance of a long-bearded old man,
this demon lord Digimon is one of the 'Seven Great
Demon Lords'. With a cruel personality, it is obsessed
with all the treasure that exists within the Network,
and won't hesitate to ruthlessly kill other Digimon in
order to obtain that treasure.
translation:
With the appearance of a long-bearded old man,
this demon lord Digimon is one of the 'Seven Great
Demon Lords'. With a cruel personality, it is obsessed
with all the treasure that exists within the Network,
and won't hesitate to ruthlessly kill other Digimon in
order to obtain that treasure.

original:
With incredible stamina and speed, this cyborg
Digimon defends the mysterious 'Royal Base'. During
combat, it is seen constantly moving about.
translation:
With incredible stamina and speed, this cyborg
Digimon defends the mysterious 'Royal Base'. During
combat, it is seen constantly moving about.

original:
Possessing the powers of a wyvern, this Digimon is a
member of the holy 'Royal Knights'. It boasts
incredibly tenacious dragon-like strength, and dragon
armor made from high-purity 'Chrome Digizoid'.
translation:
Possessing the powers of a wyvern, this Digimon is a
member of the holy 'Royal Knights'. It boasts
incredibly tenacious dragon-like strength, and dragon
armor made from high-purity 'Chrome Digizoid'.

original:
A member of the 'Royal Knights' this holy knight
Digimon has no mercy for weaker beings that dare
oppose it, and shows a cruel side when it comes to
executing its duty.
translation:
A member of the 'Royal Knights' this holy knight
Digimon has no mercy for weaker beings that dare
oppose it, and shows a cruel side when it comes to
executing its duty.

original:
A member of the 'Royal Knights' the extraordinary
size of this holy knight Digimon's data is so massive,
traditional digital tools are unable to fully render it.
translation:
A member of the 'Royal Knights' the extraordinary
size of this holy knight Digimon's data is so massive,
traditional digital tools are unable to fully render it.

original:
Born from the fusion of WarGreymon and
MetalGarurumon, this holy knight Digimon is a member
of the 13 'Royal Knights'. Due to it being a
combination of two Digimon, it is able to display
impressive power in any situation.
translation:
Born from the fusion of WarGreymon and
MetalGarurumon, this holy knight Digimon is a member
of the 13 'Royal Knights'. Due to it being a
combination of two Digimon, it is able to display
impressive power in any situation.

original:
An ancient dragon Digimon that was once an
Imperialdramon Dragon Mode, it unleashed its full
power causing a Mode change into this more humanoid
form that is more capable of controlling its power.
In this humanoid form, it is equipped with the
'Positron Laser' on its right arm.
translation:
An ancient dragon Digimon that was once an
Imperialdramon Dragon Mode, it unleashed its full
power causing a Mode change into this more humanoid
form that is more capable of controlling its power.
In this humanoid form, it is equipped with the
'Positron Laser' on its right arm.

original:
Originally an Imperialdramon Fighter Mode, this Digimon
borrowed the power of Omegamon in order to power
up into Imperialdramon's final form. It is equipped with
the Mega sword, 'Omega Blade', and is said to have
once saved the Digital World from destruction.
translation:
Originally an Imperialdramon Fighter Mode, this Digimon
borrowed the power of Omegamon in order to power
up into Imperialdramon's final form. It is equipped with
the Mega sword, 'Omega Blade', and is said to have
once saved the Digital World from destruction.

original:
With a Digicore in its chest, the 'Digital Hazard' of
this holy knight Digimon has been sealed away. With
ten snowy white wings and deep crimson armor, it
wields the divine lance 'Gungnir' and divine sword
'Blutgang'.
translation:
With a Digicore in its chest, the 'Digital Hazard' of
this holy knight Digimon has been sealed away. With
ten snowy white wings and deep crimson armor, it
wields the divine lance 'Gungnir' and divine sword
'Blutgang'.

original:
This special Digimon is large in size, and is said to
have been born from a massive DigiEgg created
through the fusion of many Kuramon, the rookie form
of Diaboromon, that were full of malice.
translation:
This special Digimon is large in size, and is said to
have been born from a massive DigiEgg created
through the fusion of many Kuramon, the rookie form
of Diaboromon, that were full of malice.

original:
This high level demon lord Digimon was born from
controlling hearts that were overflowing with evil
power. It is Myotismon's final form, and is a being
that has surpassed VenomMyotismon in intelligence.
translation:
This high level demon lord Digimon was born from
controlling hearts that were overflowing with evil
power. It is Myotismon's final form, and is a being
that has surpassed VenomMyotismon in intelligence.

original:
A Digimon that wields the power of darkness, it was
born from the gathered negative feelings of both
humans and Digimon. It is able to control the power of
darkness, and cause nothingness to spread. It is
able to use its numerous tentacles, which can
transform into many things and even absorb energy.
translation:
A Digimon that wields the power of darkness, it was
born from the gathered negative feelings of both
humans and Digimon. It is able to control the power of
darkness, and cause nothingness to spread. It is
able to use its numerous tentacles, which can
transform into many things and even absorb energy.

original:
Theories suggest that when Millenniummon died in a
furious battle, the dark soul it possessed was
reborn as this wicked god Digimon. As the final form
of Millenniummon, it wields extremely fearsome
powers of darkness.
translation:
Theories suggest that when Millenniummon died in a
furious battle, the dark soul it possessed was
reborn as this wicked god Digimon. As the final form
of Millenniummon, it wields extremely fearsome
powers of darkness.

original:
Having awoken to its virus instincts, this is another
form of Gallantmon. It has become nothing more than
a 'Digital Hazard', with its heart completely turned to
the Dark Side. Clad in 'Chrome Digizoid armor', it wields
the demonic lance 'Balmung' in its right hand, and the
demonic shield 'Gorgon' on its left.
translation:
Having awoken to its virus instincts, this is another
form of Gallantmon. It has become nothing more than
a 'Digital Hazard', with its heart completely turned to
the Dark Side. Clad in 'Chrome Digizoid armor', it wields
the demonic lance 'Balmung' in its right hand, and the
demonic shield 'Gorgon' on its left.

original:
This legendary Digimon is said to have been born
from the collection of all spirits in existence. It is
regarded as a destructive god that governs over
death and regeneration, and it wields the power to
distort the heavens.
translation:
This legendary Digimon is said to have been born
from the collection of all spirits in existence. It is
regarded as a destructive god that governs over
death and regeneration, and it wields the power to
distort the heavens.

original:
A soul Digimon born from the darkness of one's
heart, this Digimon exists within Millenniummon's inner
world. Though it doesn't possess a fixed form, its
shape will change according to its level of hatred and
anger. Its abilities are particularly fearsome, as they
attack the opponents soul directly.
translation:
A soul Digimon born from the darkness of one's
heart, this Digimon exists within Millenniummon's inner
world. Though it doesn't possess a fixed form, its
shape will change according to its level of hatred and
anger. Its abilities are particularly fearsome, as they
attack the opponents soul directly.

original:
This phantom bird Digimon inhabits the stratosphere
about 40km up in the sky. With six gigantic wings,
its wingspan reaches as much as 30m, and it is said
to be an ancient Digimon that has existed since the
creation of the Digital World.
translation:
This phantom bird Digimon inhabits the stratosphere
about 40km up in the sky. With six gigantic wings,
its wingspan reaches as much as 30m, and it is said
to be an ancient Digimon that has existed since the
creation of the Digital World.

original:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this ShineGreymon
possesses a unique form clad in an aura of
high-energy flames comparable to the sun in
intensity.
translation:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this ShineGreymon
possesses a unique form clad in an aura of
high-energy flames comparable to the sun in
intensity.

original:
Once a ShineGreymon, this Digimon has entered a 
frenzied state after 'Burst Evolving' using the power 
of darkness. It is enveloped in dark flames and uses 
its special skill 'Torrid Weiss' to shoot scorching 
hot flames from its fingertips indiscriminately.
translation:
Once a ShineGreymon, this Digimon has entered a 
frenzied state after 'Burst Evolving' using the power 
of darkness. It is enveloped in dark flames and uses 
its special skill 'Torrid Weiss' to shoot scorching 
hot flames from its fingertips indiscriminately.

original:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this MirageGaogamon's body
is enveloped in an aura with power rivalling that of
the planets. It wields a special weapon that
possesses planetary-class energy.
translation:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this MirageGaogamon's body
is enveloped in an aura with power rivalling that of
the planets. It wields a special weapon that
possesses planetary-class energy.

original:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this Ravemon wears all the
energy within the atmosphere as an aura.
translation:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this Ravemon wears all the
energy within the atmosphere as an aura.

original:
Given the nickname 'King of Destruction', this Digimon
is the final form of Beelzemon. It has jet-black wings
sprouting from its back, and wields a Blaster on its
right hand which releases 'Chaos Flare', flames whose
tremendous heat is comparable to the flames of Hell.
translation:
Given the nickname 'King of Destruction', this Digimon
is the final form of Beelzemon. It has jet-black wings
sprouting from its back, and wields a Blaster on its
right hand which releases 'Chaos Flare', flames whose
tremendous heat is comparable to the flames of Hell.

original:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this Rosemon wears an
aura of love and beauty.
translation:
Having temporarily reached the limits of its abilities
through 'Burst Evolution', this Rosemon wears an
aura of love and beauty.

original:
Having retained both Digicores despite performing a
DNA Digivolution, this Digimon's existence is
considered a bug in the Digital World. It is an unstable
Digimon, and it was given the codename 'Chaosmon',
for it 'should not exist'.
translation:
Having retained both Digicores despite performing a
DNA Digivolution, this Digimon's existence is
considered a bug in the Digital World. It is an unstable
Digimon, and it was given the codename 'Chaosmon',
for it 'should not exist'.

original:
This Digimon guards the East, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that is capable of releasing
intense lighting strikes.
translation:
This Digimon guards the East, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that is capable of releasing
intense lighting strikes.

original:
This Digimon guards the West, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that possesses the attribute of
steel.
translation:
This Digimon guards the West, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that possesses the attribute of
steel.

original:
This Digimon guards the South, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that is capable of manipulating
incandescent flames.
translation:
This Digimon guards the South, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that is capable of manipulating
incandescent flames.

original:
This Digimon guards the North, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that makes use of phantasmagoric
water skills.
translation:
This Digimon guards the North, as one of the Four
Holy Beasts who protect the Digital World. It is a
legendary Digimon that makes use of phantasmagoric
water skills.

original:
Clad in shining gold armor that shines with a light said
to purify all evil, this subspecies Digimon was born
from the fusion of Plesiomon and Seadramon data.
translation:
Clad in shining gold armor that shines with a light said
to purify all evil, this subspecies Digimon was born
from the fusion of Plesiomon and Seadramon data.
